Plot: Margaret MacNiel, a girl living in a Cape Breton coal mining town, finds her life changing when she meets Neil Currie, a cheerful bagpipe-playing dishwasher. Unfortunately, neither of them are able to escape the industry around them.
Title: Margaret's Museum
Writer: Sheldon Currie (story "The Glace Bay Miner's Museum"), Gerald Wexler, Mort Ransen
Actors: Helena Bonham Carter, Clive Russell, Craig Anthony Olejnik, Kate Nelligan
